title: Grannie - Grannie (1971) (UK prog rock) (320 kbps)
description:
Grannie - "Grannie"  (1971)  (UK prog rock)  (mp3, 320 kbps)


includes cover scans.


Notes from the back of the CD:
==
One of the least-heard but most beguiling albums to emerge from the British progressive rock era, the sole, self-titled album by East London band Grannie was recorded at a demo studio in late 1971 and then issued on vinyl in a total pressing of just 99 copies.  Feverishly sought-after by genre aÃ¯Â¬ï¿½cionados since its belated discovery in the early 1990s, Grannie now gains its first-ever official reissue.  With quotes from drummer John Clark and keyboardist John Stevenson that tell the story of both band and album for the first time, this is the definitive release of one of the most valuable jewels of the early 1970s British progressive rock scene.
==
